flux.name: FLUX 1.1 Pro
flux.description: A high-fidelity, photography-optimized generative model known for realism, consistent lighting, and strong composition.

ideogram.name: Ideogram V3 Turbo
ideogram.description: Produces clean photographic scenes and excels at text rendering inside generated images, designed for brand and design workflows.

imagen.name: Imagen 4
imagen.description: Photorealistic text-to-image system with strict safety filtering, fine detail, and strong color consistency.

seedream.name: Seedream 4
seedream.description: Supports image generation, style variations, and editing workflows with emphasis on creative flexibility.

stable.name: Stable Diffusion (v1.5-SDXL)
stable.description: The most influential open-source text-to-image model; widely adopted, extensible, and customizable via community models.
